node.title: Klock
node.description: Want a local clock on your stream overlay? Then we've got you covered! Simply edit your clock precisely as you want and import it directly into your OBS scenes.

node.title: Mascot Assets
node.description: Thank you for the outpouring of love for our new mascots; the adorable crab Dango and precious fish Mochi! We are releasing a free asset pack to celebrate so you, too, can swim with our aquatic friends!
